name: Mjœdŏnland
description:
It was an ordinary day at home. I was working from home, when I heard a weird

noise behind me. It must be my pet rabbit, Purci: she is always making weird noises when she is hungry. But this noise was different… and my bunny wasn’t here.. the noise came from so far away… not from this room…

Side note:

It automatically saves. So if you stucked, then you should  delete this save file:

C:\Users\\AppData\LocalLow\DefaultCompany\RPG
is your windows user name.
